verses.verse: After <S%G3326><s%> this <S%G5023><s%> there was <S%G2258><s%> a feast <S%G1859><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> Jews; <S%G2453><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> went up <S%G305><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> Jerusalem. <S%G2414><s%>

Now <S%G1161><s%> there is <S%G2076><s%> at <S%G1722><s%> Jerusalem <S%G2414><s%> by <S%G1909><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> sheep <S%G4262><s%> market a pool, <S%G2861><s%> which is called <S%G1951><s%> in the Hebrew tongue <S%G1447><s%> Bethesda, <S%G964><s%> having <S%G2192><s%> five <S%G4002><s%> porches. <S%G4745><s%>

In <S%G1722><s%> these <S%G5025><s%> lay <S%G2621><s%> a great <S%G4183><s%> multitude <S%G4128><s%> of impotent folk, <S%G770><s%> of blind, <S%G5185><s%> halt, <S%G5560><s%> withered, <S%G3584><s%> waiting for <S%G1551><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> moving <S%G2796><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> water. <S%G5204><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> an angel <S%G32><s%> went down <S%G2597><s%> at a certain season <S%G2596><s%> <S%G2540><s%> into <S%G1722><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> pool, <S%G2861><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> troubled <S%G5015><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> water: <S%G5204><s%> whosoever then <S%G3767><s%> first <S%G4413><s%> after <S%G3326><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> troubling <S%G5016><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> water <S%G5204><s%> stepped in <S%G1684><s%> was made <S%G1096><s%> whole <S%G5199><s%> of whatsoever <S%G3739><s%> <S%G1221><s%> disease <S%G3553><s%> he had. <S%G2722><s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> a certain <S%G5100><s%> man <S%G444><s%> was <S%G2258><s%> there, <S%G1563><s%> which had <S%G2192><s%> an <S%G1722><s%> infirmity <S%G769><s%> thirty and eight <S%G5144><s%> <S%G3638><s%> years. <S%G2094><s%>

When Jesus <S%G2424><s%> saw <S%G1492><s%> him <S%G5126><s%> lie, <S%G2621><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> knew <S%G1097><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> he had been <S%G2192><s%> now <S%G2235><s%> a long <S%G4183><s%> time <S%G5550><s%> in that case, he saith <S%G3004><s%> unto him, <S%G846><s%> Wilt <S%G2309><s%> thou be made <S%G1096><s%> whole? <S%G5199><s%>

The <S%G3588><s%> impotent man <S%G770><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> Sir, <S%G2962><s%> I have <S%G2192><s%> no <S%G3756><s%> man, <S%G444><s%> <S%G2443><s%> when <S%G3752><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> water <S%G5204><s%> is troubled, <S%G5015><s%> to put <S%G906><s%> me <S%G3165><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> pool: <S%G2861><s%> but <S%G1161><s%> while <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3739><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> am coming, <S%G2064><s%> another <S%G243><s%> steppeth down <S%G2597><s%> before <S%G4253><s%> me. <S%G1700><s%>
Jesus <S%G2424><s%> saith <S%G3004><s%> unto him, <S%G846><s%> Rise, <S%G1453><s%> take up <S%G142><s%> thy <S%G4675><s%> bed, <S%G2895><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> walk. <S%G4043><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> immediately <S%G2112><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> man <S%G444><s%> was made <S%G1096><s%> whole, <S%G5199><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> took up <S%G142><s%> his <S%G846><s%> bed, <S%G2895><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> walked: <S%G4043><s%> and <S%G1161><s%> on <S%G1722><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> same <S%G1565><s%> day <S%G2250><s%> was <S%G2258><s%> the sabbath. <S%G4521><s%>

The <S%G3588><s%> Jews <S%G2453><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> unto him that was cured, <S%G2323><s%> It is <S%G2076><s%> the sabbath day: <S%G4521><s%> it is not lawful <S%G1832><s%> <S%G3756><s%> for thee <S%G4671><s%> to carry <S%G142><s%> thy bed. <S%G2895><s%>

He answered <S%G611><s%> them, <S%G846><s%> He that made <S%G4160><s%> me <S%G3165><s%> whole, <S%G5199><s%> the same <S%G1565><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> unto me, <S%G3427><s%> Take up <S%G142><s%> thy <S%G4675><s%> bed, <S%G2895><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> walk. <S%G4043><s%>

Then <S%G3767><s%> asked <S%G2065><s%> they him, <S%G846><s%> What <S%G5101><s%> man <S%G444><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> that which said <S%G2036><s%> unto thee, <S%G4671><s%> Take up <S%G142><s%> thy <S%G4675><s%> bed, <S%G2895><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> walk? <S%G4043><s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> he that was healed <S%G2390><s%> wist <S%G1492><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> who <S%G5101><s%> it was: <S%G2076><s%> for <S%G1063><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> had conveyed himself away, <S%G1593><s%> a multitude <S%G3793><s%> being <S%G5607><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> that place. <S%G5117><s%>

Afterward <S%G3326><s%> <S%G5023><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> findeth <S%G2147><s%> him <S%G846><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> temple, <S%G2411><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> unto him, <S%G846><s%> Behold, <S%G2396><s%> thou art made <S%G1096><s%> whole: <S%G5199><s%> sin <S%G264><s%> no more, <S%G3371><s%> lest <S%G3363><s%> a worse <S%G5501><s%> thing <S%G5100><s%> come <S%G1096><s%> unto thee. <S%G4671><s%>

The <S%G3588><s%> man <S%G444><s%> departed, <S%G565><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> told <S%G312><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> Jews <S%G2453><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> it was <S%G2076><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> which had made <S%G4160><s%> him <S%G846><s%> whole. <S%G5199><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> therefore <S%G1223><s%> <S%G5124><s%> did the <S%G3588><s%> Jews <S%G2453><s%> persecute <S%G1377><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> sought <S%G2212><s%> to slay <S%G615><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> because <S%G3754><s%> he had done <S%G4160><s%> these things <S%G5023><s%> on <S%G1722><s%> the sabbath day. <S%G4521><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> them, <S%G846><s%> My <S%G3450><s%> Father <S%G3962><s%> worketh <S%G2038><s%> hitherto, <S%G2193><s%> <S%G737><s%> and I <S%G2504><s%> work. <S%G2038><s%>

Therefore <S%G1223><s%> <S%G5124><s%> <S%G3767><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> Jews <S%G2453><s%> sought <S%G2212><s%> the more <S%G3123><s%> to kill <S%G615><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> because <S%G3754><s%> he not <S%G3756><s%> only <S%G3440><s%> had broken <S%G3089><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> sabbath, <S%G4521><s%> but <S%G235><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> that God <S%G2316><s%> was his <S%G2398><s%> Father, <S%G3962><s%> making <S%G4160><s%> himself <S%G1438><s%> equal <S%G2470><s%> with God. <S%G2316><s%>

Then <S%G3767><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> unto them, <S%G846><s%> Verily, <S%G281><s%> verily, <S%G281><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> unto you, <S%G5213><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Son <S%G5207><s%> can <S%G1410><s%> <S%G3756><s%> do <S%G4160><s%> nothing <S%G3762><s%> of <S%G575><s%> himself, <S%G1438><s%> but <S%G3362><s%> what <S%G5100><s%> he seeth <S%G991><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> Father <S%G3962><s%> do: <S%G4160><s%> for <S%G1063><s%> what things soever <S%G3739><s%> <S%G302><s%> he <S%G1565><s%> doeth, <S%G4160><s%> these <S%G5023><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> doeth <S%G4160><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> Son <S%G5207><s%> likewise. <S%G3668><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> Father <S%G3962><s%> loveth <S%G5368><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> Son, <S%G5207><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> showeth <S%G1166><s%> him <S%G846><s%> all things <S%G3956><s%> that <S%G3739><s%> himself <S%G846><s%> doeth: <S%G4160><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> he will show <S%G1166><s%> him <S%G846><s%> greater <S%G3187><s%> works <S%G2041><s%> than these, <S%G5130><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> ye <S%G5210><s%> may marvel. <S%G2296><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> as <S%G5618><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> Father <S%G3962><s%> raiseth up <S%G1453><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> dead, <S%G3498><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> quickeneth <S%G2227><s%> them; even so <S%G3779><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> Son <S%G5207><s%> <S%G2532><s%> quickeneth <S%G2227><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> he will. <S%G2309><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> <S%G3761><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> Father <S%G3962><s%> judgeth <S%G2919><s%> no man, <S%G3762><s%> but <S%G235><s%> hath committed <S%G1325><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> judgment <S%G2920><s%> unto the <S%G3588><s%> Son: <S%G5207><s%>

That <S%G2443><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> men should honor <S%G5091><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> Son, <S%G5207><s%> even as <S%G2531><s%> they honor <S%G5091><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> Father. <S%G3962><s%> He that honoreth <S%G5091><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> Son <S%G5207><s%> honoreth <S%G5091><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> Father <S%G3962><s%> which hath sent <S%G3992><s%> him. <S%G846><s%>

Verily, <S%G281><s%> verily, <S%G281><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> unto you, <S%G5213><s%> <S%G3754><s%> He that heareth <S%G191><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> word, <S%G3056><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> believeth <S%G4100><s%> on him that sent <S%G3992><s%> me, <S%G3165><s%> hath <S%G2192><s%> everlasting <S%G166><s%> life, <S%G2222><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> shall not <S%G3756><s%> come <S%G2064><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> condemnation; <S%G2920><s%> but <S%G235><s%> is passed <S%G3327><s%> from <S%G1537><s%> death <S%G2288><s%> unto <S%G1519><s%> life. <S%G2222><s%>

Verily, <S%G281><s%> verily, <S%G281><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> unto you, <S%G5213><s%> The <S%G3754><s%> hour <S%G5610><s%> is coming, <S%G2064><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> now <S%G3568><s%> is, <S%G2076><s%> when <S%G3753><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> dead <S%G3498><s%> shall hear <S%G191><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> voice <S%G5456><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> Son <S%G5207><s%> of God: <S%G2316><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> they that hear <S%G191><s%> shall live. <S%G2198><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> as <S%G5618><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> Father <S%G3962><s%> hath <S%G2192><s%> life <S%G2222><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> himself; <S%G1438><s%> so <S%G3779><s%> hath he given <S%G1325><s%> to <S%G2532><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> Son <S%G5207><s%> to have <S%G2192><s%> life <S%G2222><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> himself; <S%G1438><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> hath given <S%G1325><s%> him <S%G846><s%> authority <S%G1849><s%> to execute <S%G4160><s%> judgment <S%G2920><s%> also, <S%G2532><s%> because <S%G3754><s%> he is <S%G2076><s%> the Son <S%G5207><s%> of man. <S%G444><s%>

Marvel <S%G2296><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> at this: <S%G5124><s%> for <S%G3754><s%> the hour <S%G5610><s%> is coming, <S%G2064><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the which <S%G3739><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> that <S%G3588><s%> are in <S%G1722><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> graves <S%G3419><s%> shall hear <S%G191><s%> his <S%G846><s%> voice, <S%G5456><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> shall come forth; <S%G1607><s%> they that have done <S%G4160><s%> good, <S%G18><s%> unto <S%G1519><s%> the resurrection <S%G386><s%> of life; <S%G2222><s%> and <S%G1161><s%> they that have done <S%G4238><s%> evil, <S%G5337><s%> unto <S%G1519><s%> the resurrection <S%G386><s%> of damnation. <S%G2920><s%>

I <S%G1473><s%> can <S%G1410><s%> <S%G3756><s%> of <S%G575><s%> mine own self <S%G1683><s%> do <S%G4160><s%> nothing: <S%G3762><s%> as <S%G2531><s%> I hear, <S%G191><s%> I judge: <S%G2919><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> my <S%G1699><s%> judgment <S%G2920><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> just; <S%G1342><s%> because <S%G3754><s%> I seek <S%G2212><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> mine own <S%G1699><s%> will, <S%G2307><s%> but <S%G235><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> will <S%G2307><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> Father <S%G3962><s%> which hath sent <S%G3992><s%> me. <S%G3165><s%>
If <S%G1437><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> bear witness <S%G3140><s%> of <S%G4012><s%> myself, <S%G1683><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> witness <S%G3141><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> true. <S%G227><s%>

There is <S%G2076><s%> another <S%G243><s%> that beareth witness <S%G3140><s%> of <S%G4012><s%> me; <S%G1700><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> I know <S%G1492><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> witness <S%G3141><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> he witnesseth <S%G3140><s%> of <S%G4012><s%> me <S%G1700><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> true. <S%G227><s%>
Ye <S%G5210><s%> sent <S%G649><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> John, <S%G2491><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> he bare witness <S%G3140><s%> unto the <S%G3588><s%> truth. <S%G225><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> receive <S%G2983><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> testimony <S%G3141><s%> from <S%G3844><s%> man: <S%G444><s%> but <S%G235><s%> these things <S%G5023><s%> I say, <S%G3004><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> ye <S%G5210><s%> might be saved. <S%G4982><s%>

He <S%G1565><s%> was <S%G2258><s%> a burning <S%G2545><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> a shining <S%G5316><s%> light: <S%G3088><s%> and <S%G1161><s%> ye <S%G5210><s%> were willing <S%G2309><s%> for <S%G4314><s%> a season <S%G5610><s%> to rejoice <S%G21><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> his <S%G846><s%> light. <S%G5457><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> have <S%G2192><s%> greater <S%G3187><s%> witness <S%G3141><s%> than that of John: <S%G2491><s%> for <S%G1063><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> works <S%G2041><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> Father <S%G3962><s%> hath given <S%G1325><s%> me <S%G3427><s%> to <S%G2443><s%> finish, <S%G5048><s%> the <S%G846><s%> same <S%G846><s%> works <S%G2041><s%> that <S%G3739><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> do, <S%G4160><s%> bear witness <S%G3140><s%> of <S%G4012><s%> me, <S%G1700><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> Father <S%G3962><s%> hath sent <S%G649><s%> me. <S%G3165><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> Father <S%G3962><s%> himself, <S%G846><s%> which hath sent <S%G3992><s%> me, <S%G3165><s%> hath borne witness <S%G3140><s%> of <S%G4012><s%> me. <S%G1700><s%> Ye have neither <S%G3777><s%> heard <S%G191><s%> his <S%G846><s%> voice <S%G5456><s%> at any time, <S%G4455><s%> nor <S%G3777><s%> seen <S%G3708><s%> his <S%G846><s%> shape. <S%G1491><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> ye have <S%G2192><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> his <S%G846><s%> word <S%G3056><s%> abiding <S%G3306><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> you: <S%G5213><s%> for <S%G3754><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> he <S%G1565><s%> hath sent, <S%G649><s%> him <S%G5129><s%> ye <S%G5210><s%> believe <S%G4100><s%> not. <S%G3756><s%>

Search <S%G2045><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> Scriptures; <S%G1124><s%> for <S%G3754><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> them <S%G846><s%> ye <S%G5210><s%> think <S%G1380><s%> ye have <S%G2192><s%> eternal <S%G166><s%> life: <S%G2222><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> they <S%G1565><s%> are <S%G1526><s%> they which testify <S%G3140><s%> of <S%G4012><s%> me. <S%G1700><s%>
And <S%G2532><s%> ye will <S%G2309><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> come <S%G2064><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> me, <S%G3165><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> ye might have <S%G2192><s%> life. <S%G2222><s%>
